title: The Sooper Puppy series. - Volume 1
brief_description: Contains two episodes aimed at helping young children deal with moral questions and emotions : ‘A Friend in need’ Sooper Puppy stands his ground to prevent one friend from getting involved in selling drugs, and another from playing with a gun. ‘This, that or the other’ sees Sooper Puppy exploring the complications in recognising the difference between right and wrong. He faces a series of decisions concerning friends, family and responsibility. Suitabel for Kindergarten and Lower Primary level students.
